findings.title: Hardcoded API Key in config.py
findings.description: An API key was found hardcoded in the configuration file. This poses a significant security risk.
findings.fix: Remove the hardcoded API key and use environment variables or a secrets manager.

findings.title: Vulnerable npm package: express
findings.description: express 4.16.0 has known vulnerabilities affecting request handling.
findings.fix: Update to express@4.18.2 or later. Run: npm update express

findings.title: SQL Injection vulnerability detected
findings.description: Direct string concatenation in SQL query may lead to SQL injection attacks.
findings.fix: Use parameterized queries or an ORM to prevent SQL injection.

findings.title: Weak cryptographic algorithm
findings.description: Use of MD5 hash function which is cryptographically weak.
findings.fix: Use SHA-256 or stronger hashing algorithms.

findings.title: Missing security headers
findings.description: Application does not set recommended security headers like X-Content-Type-Options.
findings.fix: Add security headers to all HTTP responses.
